name: Appscend
tag_list: mobile-apps, layar-player, qr-codes, cms, in-app-purchases, push-notifications, mobile-analytics
overview:
Appscend is the world’s first mobile performance based application platform. Specifically Appscend’s holistic approach offers its customers the fastest cross platform development technology available on the market today, together with a complete list of backend technologies that ensure application & user management, a powerful push platform as well as app analytics.

Appscend’s software components work together to create a powerful mobile ecosystem generating ad-ditional value and unprecedented actionable insights for companies developing their mobile strategy. Our vision is to empower companies and organizations to create mobile, interactive experiences that drive engagement in a simple and fast manner.

Since the launch of the Appscend platform in 2011, over 2500 referrals, resellers and white label partners actively rely on Appscend’s powerful technology and more than 250 applications, serving direct customers, are published in Apple iTunes and Google Play. Having reached 500,000 users worldwide, Appscend empowers businesses to further develop their marketing strategy, boosting their users’ engagement and customer retention. Moreover, Appscend is an essential tool in optimizing both the deployment process inside companies and the monetization mechanism for the published mobile applications.

offices.address1: New York, USA 1710 First Avenue, NY 10128 Phone: 1-877-778-5183 Mail: officeny@appscend.com

milestones.description: Appscend expanding worldwide, by opening new offices in Latin America (Chile) and United States (New York).
